title: Agent-Human Workflow System
description:
Implement collaborative workflow between AI agents (via ticker) and humans for task completion. This replaces the simple 'manual' boolean with a richer model where agents can hand off tasks to humans for specific reasons (approval, input, review, etc.) and humans can respond with structured verdicts.

Key components:
- Three new enum fields: requires, awaiting, verdict
- New CLI commands: approve, reject
- New CLI flags for create/update/list/next
- Verdict processing state machine
- Backwards compatibility with manual field

Reference: ../ticker/docs/AGENT_HUMAN_WORKFLOW.md
